biotools.summary: The MAExplorer is a Java-based bioinformatics exploratory data-analysis and data-mining program for analyzing sets of quantitative spotted cDNA or oligonucleotide microarray data . It includes data management, graphics, statistics, clustering, reports, gene data-filtering, user written MAEPlugins, documentation, tutorials, demo data. The exploratory data analysis environment provides tools for the data-mining of quantitative expression profiles across multiple microarrays.
